text: Lofn is a goddess in Norse mythology. Lofn is described in the Prose Edda, written in the 13th century by Snorri Sturluson. She is described as a gentle woman who arranges marriages. She survived the Ragnar√∂k, the battle at the end of the world to determine the fate of the gods. Category:Norse gods and goddesses Category:Marriage goddesses
title: Lofn
